metadata.name: The Electric Company
metadata.summary: A group of friends who share a love of language and are sworn to do the right thing.
metadata.description: Hey you guuuyyysss! Many parents will remember that beloved catchphrase from the original, THE ELECTRIC COMPANY. Over 30 years later, the show has been re-energized to relate to today's kids with a hip, young cast and a dose of pop culture. It strives to power up children's fundamental reading skills with music, humor, technology and celebrities.
metadata.keywords: PBS, PBS KIDS, kids, children, children's programming, cartoons, educational, reading
